title: Breaking down the question
text: Recollect the significant figure rules for division and the method to calculate for uncertainty

title: Sub-questions
text: How many significant figures are there in $$2.0$$?

title: Sub-questions
text: How many significant figures are there in 90?

title: Combining
text: How many significant figures should we have in the answer? (Hint: Minimum value of significant figures for the two numbers we are multiplying)

title: Combining
text: What is the uncertainty percentage for $$2$$ $$\frac{km}{hr}$$ change at $$90$$ $$\frac{km}{hr}$$? ((Remember the answer has to have only $$2$$ significant figures))
